title: Bug 112615XhasMember is not processed correctly when passed from AJDT
description: Bug 112615XhasMember is not processed correctly when passed from AJDT
SR: To test this in AJDT install the bean example, add a new interface called Iand then add the following line to BoundPoint.aj:declare parents: hasmethod( set(..)) implements I;Now open the AspectJ Compiler preference page and select "Has Member" on theadvanced tab.Click OK, rebuild and if the option was working the projectwould build correctly.As it stands there is an error:the type pattern hasmethod( set(..)) can only be used when the XhasMemberoption is set
